text: Eschweiler Hauptbahnhof is the main and also biggest railway station of the German town of Eschweiler in North Rhine-Westphalia. It was opened in September 1841, and is on the line Aachen-Cologne. Eschweiler Central railway station lies about 700 meters from inner town. == References == * Eschweiler Hauptbahnhof Category:1841 establishments in Europe Category:1840s establishments in Germany Category:Buildings and structures in North Rhine- Westphalia Category:Eschweiler Category:Railway stations in Germany
title: Eschweiler Hauptbahnhof
